text: Pilosocereus azulensis is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Brazil. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical dry forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Sources== * Taylor, N.P. 2002. Pilosocereus azulensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
